room_title: Escape room "Loose Sleuth" by PuzzleWorks in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had a fantastic time in the Loose Sleuth puzzle room. It was well thought out with unexpected twists!

room_title: Escape room "Loose Sleuth" by PuzzleWorks in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Great experience! We did the Loose Sleuth room for a work outing, it was a great team activity-challenging and fun! Employee working was awesome.
